Themed

fa71a03b-656e-40a9-927a-62222e23c9a8.plaintext: The Volto Divider Block is a simple yet effective content management tool available in the Volto frontend for the Plone CMS framework. It allows content creators to visually separate sections of a webpage, improving clarity, structure, and design aesthetics. The Divider Block doesn’t contain any text or interactive elements, but it plays a crucial role in creating clean, well-organized layouts.

children.text: The
Volto Divider Block

is a simple yet effective content management tool available in the Volto frontend for the Plone CMS framework. It allows content creators to visually separate sections of a webpage, improving clarity, structure, and design aesthetics. The Divider Block doesn’t contain any text or interactive elements, but it plays a crucial role in creating clean, well-organized layouts.

description: The Volto Divider Block is a simple yet effective content management tool available in the Volto frontend for the Plone CMS framework. It allows content creators to visually separate sections of a webpage, improving clarity, structure, and design aesthetics. The Divider Block doesn’t contain any text or interactive elements, but it plays a crucial role in creating clean, well-organized layouts.

parent.description: Description block support rich text functionality while the Dublin core metadata of this page remains plain text.
parent.title: Blocks
